item.title: Gerald Nguyen
item.description: About me A software craftsman who writes clean code, automated tests, and practices continuous improvement A seasoned IT professional with 17 years of experience in various industries, business domains, and roles An admirer of (Vulcan) logic, diversity, and multidisciplinary approaches Connect with me on Linkedin, or X (formerly Twitter) Personal Projects HTML to Markdown An Chrome extension that translate selected HTML text to equivalent markdown format. It allows user to select and convert headers, paragraphs, images or links on the web into Markdown text quickly and effortlessly
